p.a: Town of North Providence, Rhode Island

div.p: North Providence Town Hall • 2000 Smith Street • North Providence, RI 02911 • (401) 232-0900

li.class: menu-item menu-item-type-post_type menu-item-object-page menu-item-home current-menu-item page_item page-item-427 current_page_item menu-item-430

li.a: Remove the Whole Lead Pipe Program

div.class: post-427 page type-page status-publish hentry entry

h2.span:
Closings, Cancellations and Notices
Due to

ul.li: Until further notice, North Providence Town Hall hours will be from 8:30 am – 4:00 pm, Monday through Friday. Last recording in the Town Clerk’s office is at 3:30 pm.

li.a: Mayor Lombardi Declares a State of Municipal Emergency in North Providence, March 16, 2020
North Providence Public Schools Providing Free Meals to NP Children

ul.li: Town Library closed until further notice.
Recreation Department and the Pool closed till further notice.
The Mancini Center is closed until further notice. Visit mancinicenter.com or facebook.com/npmancinicenter for Senior Resources and Updates.

div.class: soliloquy-container soliloquy-transition-fade soliloquy-fade soliloquy-arrows-active soliloquy-default-slider soliloquy-theme-classic

div.div: North Providence Town Hall is open from 8:30 am – 4:00 pm, Monday through Friday. Closed on holidays. Town Hall is located at 2000 Smith Street, North Providence, Rhode Island 02911. Call us at 401-232-0900.

a.title: The Meehan Overlook at Notte Park

img.alt: The Meehan Overlook at Notte Park

div.div: The Meehan Overlook at Notte Park is available for event rentals. It is ideal for weddings, corporate or social events. Nestled in historic Notte Park, the Overlook provides a panoramic view of the Wenscott Reservoir.

a.title: Remove the Whole Lead Pipe Program

img.alt: Remove the Whole Lead Pipe Program

div.div: The Remove the Whole Lead Pipe Program (RWLP) is a partnership between the Town of North Providence and Providence Water under the leadership of Mayor Charles Lombardi. Click for more information

img.alt: The Meehan Overlook at Notte Park
Remove the Whole Lead Pipe Program

br.a: E-Permitting for Online Filing of Permits

td.p:
The Overlook at Meehan is now available for event rentals. The property renovations were completed in May 2016. It is ideal for weddings, corporate or social events. Nestled in historic Gov. Notte Park, the Overlook provides a panoramic view of the Wenscott Reservoir.
More Information

The Town Council and School Committee of the Town of North Providence have approved the implementation of a Whistleblower Hotline to provide a channel of communication for citizens, employees, vendors and service providers, students and their parents and any other stakeholder to make known any inefficient, fraudulent, improper or illegal activities related to any municipal or school department or agency or contractor working on a town or school department project.

a.title: Town of North Providence Whistleblower Hotline
a.strong: Link to the Whistleblower Hotline and further information

br.em: This Whistleblower Hotline webpage is hosted on EthicsPoint’s secure servers and is
not part of the Town of North Providence website or intranet.

p.span: Watch North Providence Town Council Meetings Online

td.p: Watch live, listen or download to your device anytime – meetings are posted on the Watch Town Council Meetings Online page.
